articles.title: New lung cancer screening guidelines make millions more eligible for testing - NBC News
articles.description: The American Cancer Society is out with new screening guidelines for lung cancer, expanding its regular testing recommendations to nearly five million people...

articles.author: Nancy Lapid
articles.title: More older former smokers need lung cancer screening, experts say - Reuters.com
articles.description: New lung cancer screening guidelines issued by the American Cancer Society (ACS) on Wednesday call for annual testing with low‐dose computed tomography (CT) for anyone aged 50 to 80 who was formerly a long-term or heavy smoker, a recommendation that could aff…
articles.content: Nov 1 (Reuters) - New lung cancer screening guidelines issued by the American Cancer Society (ACS) on Wednesday call for annual testing with lowdose computed tomography (CT) for anyone aged 50 to 80 … [+3444 chars]
